    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionToPeer

        public ConnectionToPeer(java.lang.String ip,
                int port,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer peerId,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer infoHash,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer id)
        Creates a new ConnectionToPeer, but does not start it.
        Parameters:
        t - The torrent object that messages are to be passed to
        ip - The ip address of the peer to connect to
        port - The port of the peer to connect to
        peerId - The peerId of the peer to connect to

      • ConnectionToPeer

        public ConnectionToPeer(java.net.Socket incomingConnection,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer infoHash,
                java.nio.ByteBuffer id,
                int pieces)
        This is a constructor added in Phase 2. It's for incoming connection.
        Parameters:
        incomingConnection - The socket that is built in Listener class
        infoHash - The info hash extract from the torrent
        id - The peer id of RUBTClient
        pieces - The total number of pieces

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Peer thread run loop. Responsible for sending messages when they are ready to be sent and receiving and reassembling messages.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendHandshake

        public boolean sendHandshake(java.nio.ByteBuffer infoHash,
                    java.nio.ByteBuffer peerId)
        Sends Handshake message to peer
        Parameters:
        infoHash - ByteBuffer representation of infoHash of the torrent for which we are connecting
        peerId - ByteBuffer representation of peerId
        Returns:
        Boolean value to see whether or not the message was queued to be sent
